journal-title-group.journal-title: Proceedings. Annual Conference on Taxation and Minutes of the Annual Meeting of the National Tax Association

subj-group.subject: Analyzing Corporate Tax Issues Using Administrative Data

title-group.article-title: Anchoring and Adjustment Biases and Local Government Referenda Language
